title: Rune set
info: The Rune set is a Hardmode Vanity clothing set consisting of the Rune Robe and Rune Hat. It is always dropped together by the Rune Wizard, a rare Underground Hardmode enemy. Wearing the full set causes the player to emit a pulse effect, as well as a bright orange and green particle effect from their feet when walking. The particles are visible in darkness but do not actually emit light onto other objects.
stat:
